item.description:
The cost for zinnias, gladiolus, and dahlias (when available) is $8.99/lb. Sunflowers are $1.50/flower.

Every year I have a few places that I go for flower picking!  One of my favorite and affordable things to do.  You'll be able to make multiple beautiful, long lasting arrangements out of what you pick and take home!  It's lovely to walk among the rows and rows of colorful varieties and getting to take bunches home.  I'll have some great tips, if anyone is interested, to guide you in how to get the most for your money, plan for longer lasting blooms, etc.   Here is the website for Parlee Farms - http://parleefarms.com/flowers.html

Weather dependent!

I highly suggest a little bug repellant and, if you are allergic to bees, I would NOT suggest participating!  I love to be among the bees pollinating the flowers and they have never bothered me or stung... but I wouldn't risk it if I had allergies to them!
item.name: Fabulous, Relaxing Flower Picking TODAY in Tyngsboro
